page.title: 11TRELLECH POST OFFICE.
page.content: MRS. LINDA WILLIAMS RUNS THE POST OFFICE, ON THE CORNER COMING INTO THE VILLAGE FROM MONMOUTH. THE SHOP SELLS GENERAL STOCK SUCH AS: FOOD:FROZEN FOOD:ICE CREAM:LOLLIES:DRINK INCLUDING WINES AND SPIRITS. THE MOST EXPENSIVE WINE IS Â£12.95. THE CHEAPEST IS Â£1.65. THE SHOP IS OPEN EVERY DAY, WITH A HALF DAY ON SUNDAY, AND THE POST OFFICE IS OPEN 4 DAYS AND TWO HALF DAYS. THE POST OFFICE PROVIDES PENSIONS FOR THE ELDERLY:THE AMOUNT FOR A SINGLE PENSIONER IS Â£36.05. AND A MARRIED COUPLE IS Â£57.50. IT ALSO PROVIDES T.V. AND DOG LICENCES: GIRO BANKING, SAVINGS BANKING, TRAVELLERS CHEQUES, PREMIUM BONDS, RAIL CARDS, AND MANY OTHER PRODUCTS. MOST OF THE GOODS IN THE SHOP ARE BOUGHT FROM BRISTOL.LINDA HAS BEEN RUNNING THE POST OFFICE FOR SIX YEARS.
